name: Simpsons Park
description: Family-friendly park featuring walking trails, playgrounds, and scenic viewpoints of the Springfield Valley.

name: Springfield Nuclear Power Plant
description: Historic nuclear facility offering guided tours showcasing sustainable energy production and innovation in technology.

name: Moe's Tavern Historic District
description: Vibrant downtown area with local restaurants, shops, galleries, and entertainment venues perfect for a night out.

name: Springfield Museum of Natural History
description: World-class museum featuring exhibits on paleontology, world cultures, and interactive science displays.

name: Krusty Land Amusement Park
description: Theme park with thrilling rides, entertainment shows, and family attractions for all ages.

name: Springfield Gorge
description: Breathtaking natural wonder offering hiking trails, scenic overlooks, and opportunities for outdoor photography.

name: Evergreen Terrace Historic Neighborhood
description: Charming residential area with beautiful tree-lined streets, local coffee shops, and boutique shopping.

name: Shelbyville Speedway
description: Premier racing venue hosting motorsports events, including stock car racing, drag racing, and driving experiences.
